message.body: How's the apartment? :)
Hi!!!! So great. Can't wait for you to get here!!!
What time you get in tomorrow?! Need help w arriving/your bags? I can meet you at airport!

Ugh I'm itching to get there! Did you get my last email? My flight changed AGAIN. It's killing me. I'll land at 11 on Friday. If you're free, wonderful! Otherwise no worries. It looks like Enid wants to meet around then so you may be tied up. Thats so generous of you to offer. :)
Oh god! Standby!! Eff!! Ok cool, can def meet you if it helps!! Happy to. I'm pretty sure Enid could be flex, will give her a shout. :) get here!! We nee
d you!!!!
:) friday can't come soon enough. Let me know what Enid says and we'll go from there. Have a great day!
Thanks you too!

Enid and I rescheduled for Monday, have you heard anything about tomorrow? Also, just wanted to check on the double bed. Should I send Giles (I think that's his name) a check? And did you say you had sheets I could borrow for a bit?
I'm going to meet Enid tomorrow after we get you home! :) yes t sheets!! Borrow for indefinitely!! I have to send Giles $$ too so can sens yand you add t
o check to me
Ach
Send to him or can add to check for me. Whichever!
What airline / flight you on? I meet u at 11!
Just emailed you the info :)
Awesome! Yay! Thanks!
Do you like apples?!
Actually, I'm not a huge fan of apples which is very lane. Did you come into a wealth of them?
Haha not exactly. Just bought some great ones at a farmers mkt and thought we'd buy more so just checking! :) we r trying to arrange to borrow a car for
grocery trip on sat. Work for you?
That's brilliant! It definitely works. And I'm a huge fan of produce but I'm unfairly biased against apples... Thanks for thinking of me though!
Say hi to Alice for me! I feel bad, I don't have her number and you guys are graciously doing all this planning! Anyway I'm looking forward to meeting you both. :)
She says hi too! He's coming w me tomorrow! We are team welcoming you. :) awesome about produce and no worries about apples, we r only deducting 5 points
off your total point tally which will be easy for you to make up later. ;) travel safe and happy!!!
Taking off from Chicago shortly so no delays :) I'll let you know if that changes but otherwise I'll see you at 11:25!
Hey! So sorry to be late, we're taxiing and it's taking forever!
I'll be down in hopefully 15 minutes
Hiiiii! We're at baggage claim- saw flight was delayed. See you soon!
No worries! We r here happily waiting.
:) see you soon
Me green sweater, Alice orange sweater!
Great, if you see me first on wearing a yellow skirt
